parent1.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour using a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.

offspring.algorithm: New algorithm: Update the edge distances in the edge distance matrix based on the inverse of the frequency of each edge used in the local optimal tour with a noise factor that depends on a custom combination of edge count and distance to guide the search towards a better solution.
